text: The current code I have is significantly broken while I rebuild using jquery layouts and animations... there are some up/down/left/right swipe navigation animations, but the navigation logic is very incomplete and has redirect loops in a couple of places, the clock no longer works, the fade no longer disappears (and is not tappable), almost all layouts are broken and off-center except for the 8 I was able to fix yesterday and today. should I post a build under these conditions?
There is significant progress from a code perspective, but from a usability perspective, if I were a non-technical client, I would want to throw this out and start over
But I can post it if it would help the relationship
I'll skip my workout this afternoon and try to power through and get these things fixed... I'm just not comfortable posting a build with so many regressions
I agree, let's hold off on posting the build today until things are back in shape. If you are willing to keep working this afternoon we'd be grateful! Your call.
<@U02HCCTFL|danielle> has joined the channel

<@U0265G76F> and <@U02F8TTPU> : check out the attached images. These are in response to David wanting a title and an affordance on the splash screen. I think it's best if we move about/legal links to the menu, otherwise everything gets super crowded... thoughts? concerns?
someone please remind me about the blog post I want to write about splash screens
i would like to hear about it
i am usually vehemently anti splash screen but not in this case, actually
i hope the blog post is about how splash screens are only allowed if you embrace the idea of "making a splash"
haha
i hereby decree that we will not have a "splash" page. instead we will have a "make a splash" screen. huge development.
and there will be a matching haptic
hey guys melissa wins life
let's FLOAT that one past the client
ba-ZING!
i think its just me and you in here @ben...
:crickets:
who needs a holiday party when you have slack
I fixed all the navigation and layout issues introduced by jquery mobile and pushed to my local repo

I can't create a new merge request because my merge from 2 days ago has not been accepted yet, but I posted to basecamp that it's available. They can pull it in from their side whenever they're ready.
See you in a few!
Excellent. Thank you!
i get it.. float.
:thumbsup::clap:
:tada::tada:
